meanings.definition: The location where the main offices of an organization are situated.
meanings.sent1: Our company's headquarters is in the big city.
meanings.sent2: The headquarters of the school district is in the old building downtown.
meanings.sent3: The headquarters of the squirrel community is a cozy treehouse.
meanings.sent4: Her mind served as the headquarters of creative ideas.
meanings.sent5: The headquarters of the ant colony buzzed with activity.

meanings.definition: The administrative center or main office of a military unit.
meanings.sent1: The army's headquarters is where important decisions are made.
meanings.sent2: The general's headquarters is heavily guarded.
meanings.sent3: The headquarters of the toy soldiers was a miniature fort.
meanings.sent4: His heart was the headquarters of courage and determination.
meanings.sent5: The headquarters of the chess pieces strategized their next moves.
